Boolean Expression Simplifier

The Boolean Expression Simplifier library is an OCaml library providing means to simplify boolean expression. The original source code has been written at the chair of robotics and embedded systems at Technische Universität München by Alexander Ostrovsky and is maintained by Markus Weissmann.

The releases of the Boolean Expression Simplifier library can be downloaded from ocamlforge. The API of the Boolean Expression Simplifier library is also available online. The source code is released as open source under the (new) BSD license.

Simplify your boolean expressions!
